sources.title: Shadows In The Sun | Full Drama Movie | Harvey Keitel | Claire Forlani
sources.description:
Shadows In The Sun - An aspiring young writer (Jackson) tracks a literary titan (Keitel) suffering from writers block to his refuge in rural Italy and learns about life and love from the irascible genius and his daughters.
**This film is under non-exclusive license from APL Film. All rights reserved**
2005.  Stars: Harvey Keitel, Claire Forlani, Joshua Jackson, Giancarlo Giannini

metadata.Plot: Based on J. G. Ballard's autobiographical novel, tells the story of a boy, James Graham, whose privileged life is upturned by the Japanese invasion of Shanghai, December 8, 1941. Separated from his parents, he is eventually captured, and taken to Soo Chow confinement camp, next to a captured Chinese airfield. Amidst the sickness and food shortages in the camp, Jim attempts to reconstruct his former life, all the while bringing spirit and dignity to those around him.
metadata.Writer: Tom Stoppard, J.G. Ballard, Menno Meyjes
metadata.Actors: Christian Bale, John Malkovich, Miranda Richardson
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. 13 wins & 17 nominations total
